title: Is there a way to remove Chat Completely.
body:
Just wondering because I'm incredibly toxic at times; and It'd just be easier if it wasn't there. lol


:: Edit ::

I still can communicate with pings right? So; it shouldn't be to bad!

replies.body: I've often wondered if I was able to actually mute my chat at least.. So i can read theirs but not be able to respond.. So i can take a second to think

as soon as you enter the game, hold down <TAB> and click the mute button on EVERY player
problem solved
after game, clean your ignore list, start again.
How dare you suggest a fix to problems we are supposed to be making more champions that gets forgotten in 12 days
You can drag the chat off the screen or scale it down so you can't read it. You'll be less likely to send messages if you can't see where they go.
